imdb.plot outline: Ben's job is just like anybody else's. His co-workers don't appreciate him. His boss is out to get him. His best friend recently became a ghost who haunts the office coffee pot. You know, normal work stuff. But when Joe (that's the coffee pot, for those of you still reading this) realizes he can use his new position to help Ben, a light goes off inside his head... to indicate that he is now making coffee. Also, he has an idea.
imdb.title: Cup of Joe
plot: A twenty-something office drone discovers the ghost of his best friend and former co-worker now haunts the office coffee pot.::Joey Milillo

Ben's job is just like anybody else's. His co-workers don't appreciate him. His boss is out to get him. His best friend recently became a ghost who haunts the office coffee pot. You know, normal work stuff. But when Joe (that's the coffee pot, for those of you still reading this) realizes he can use his new position to help Ben, a light goes off inside his head... to indicate that he is now making coffee. Also, he has an idea.::Joey Milillo
